question.text:

To:Sales Agents

In the past, you simply had to pay out of pocket first then provide your receipts after renting vehicles, taking business trips, or (1) _____ other business expenses.

question.text: (2) _____, now you will be required to fill out an application which will need to be approved by the accounting department first.

question.text: Please read the attachment to get further details on what expenses can and cannot be (4) _____ by the company.

question.text:

question.text: We (2) _____ three award-winning beans, Summer Harvest, Dark Southern, and Black Earth

question.text: All can be shipped to you (3) _____ 24 hours anywhere in the continental U.S. Black Hill Beans’ coffee is also sold at every Launders Superstore in the U.S.

question.text: (4) _____ It’s nice to feel patriotic while you drink.

(C)  Let us help you find the right supplier.

question.text:
To: Nancy Craft
From: Omar Patel
Date:January 16
Subject: Pre-shipping Procedures

At the manufacturing team meeting, (1) ______ was raised that inventory wasn’t always being properly stored before being shipped. (2) ______ that concern, the team decided to review the written procedure to determine if additional steps should be added. (3) ______ Please try to arrange the schedules of the team in the packaging and storage wing so a majority of the managers can attend this meeting.
I am confident that the packaging and storage team management (4) ______ that the written procedure leaves no room for any inventory to accidentally be improperly stored. Any suggestions made by the packaging and storage team will only enhance a superior checklist.
At the manufacturing team meeting, (1) ______ was raised that inventory wasn’t always being properly stored before being shipped.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text: (2) ______ that concern, the team decided to review the written procedure to determine if additional steps should be added.

answer.explanation: The blank precedes a noun phrase (that concern), so we need to choose a preposition. Based on the meaning, we choose "due to".

question.text: (3) ______ Please try to arrange the schedules of the team in the packaging and storage wing so a majority of the managers can attend this meeting.
choices: (A) A meeting of the packaging and storage team has been set for Tuesday, January 23.
(B) All employees should be asked to review the procedure before starting work on Tuesday.
(C) The meeting will investigate the possibility of redundancies in the packaging process.
(D) Additional training sessions plan to be added sometime at the end of December.

answer.text: (A) A meeting of the packaging and storage team has been set for Tuesday, January 23.
answer.explanation: Based on the following sentence: "Please try to arrange the schedules of the team in the packaging and storage wing so a majority of the managers can attend this meeting." => This sentence mentions "a meeting"

question.text: I am confident that the packaging and storage team management (4) ______ that the written procedure leaves no room for any inventory to accidentally be improperly stored.

answer.explanation: This sentence indicates that "manufacturing team decided to review the written procedure" and asked the packaging and storage team to review for the upcoming meeting. He is confident that the procedure is adequate and the inventory will be properly stored => use future tense

question.text:

Yui Minakuchi
143 Dean St. Apt. 3

answer.explanation: would like + to infinitive

question.text: You will be pleased to know that you were selected out of a group of over 200 people (2) ______ applied for an interview

answer.explanation: In the relative clause "_____ applied for an interview" modifies "people", we need to use the relative pronoun for people in the position of subject.

question.text: We would like for you to come on the 6th at 1:30 P.M. if you are able to. If not, we can (3) ______ for you to come on the 7th.

answer.explanation: arrange + for somebody + to do something

question.text: (4) ______ If you have any questions, feel free to call our office (212-347-9919) and the human resources department will be able to assist you.
choices: (A) You will need to bring a completed application and some type of identification card.
(B) Please let us know as soon as possible if you will be able to attend.
(C) We wish we were able to accept your offer, but we must decline it.
(D) Please RSVP and indicate if you plan on bringing a guest.

answer.text: (B) Please let us know as soon as possible if you will be able to attend.
answer.explanation: In the previous sentence, the email sender gives Ms. Minakuchi options when to come for the interview so they need to know when Ms. Minakuchi will be able to attend => B is the right answer
